data.scheme_name: Aatmanirbhar Gujarat Scheme for assistance to MSMEs - Assistance for reimbursement of CGTMSE fees - Existing
data.benefits: The scheme provides reimbursement of 100% annual service fees paid to Bank / Financial institution for collateral free term loan under CGTMSE Scheme.
data.eligibility: Manufacturing MSME Enterprises which are availing collateral free term loan up to Rs. 2 Crores from financial institutions / Bank under CGTMSE will be eligible.
data.conditions: The application should be submitted within one year from the date of first disbursement of term loan or on before the date of commencement of commercial production whichever is later.
data.beneficiaries: Manufacturing MSME Enterprises which are availing collateral free term loan up to Rs. 2 Crores from financial institutions / Bank under CGTMSE will be eligible.
data.prerequisites: The application should be submitted within one year from the date of first disbursement of term loan or on before the date of commencement of commercial production whichever is later.
data.context: The Scheme is launched to boost MSME growth and strengthen the overall ecosystem in the State and help achieve the larger goal of an Aatmanirbhar Gujarat for Aatmanirbhar Bharat.
data.objective: To reimburse the service fees of Credit Guarantee Fund Transfer for Micro and Small Enterprises.
data.description: Assistance as reimbursement of 100% annual service fees paid to Bank / Financial institution for collateral free term loan under Credit Guarantee Fund Trust for Micro and Small Enterprises, for the period of five year.
data.how_to_apply: Enterprise has to apply online on IFP Portal (https://ifp.gujarat.gov.in) and hard copy at concerned DIC within one year from the listing date in SME Exchange.
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance will be disbursed with Interest subsidy once in a year.
data.additional_info:
The enterprise that has availed assistance under this component cannot avail assistance under any other scheme of other department of state government for the same component providing similar benefit. However, Enterprise can avail under such schemes of Government of India, if any.

  • Category I - Dholera, Detroj - Rampura, Dhanduka, Khamba, Dhari, Lilia, Savar Kundla, Babra, Kunkavav Vadia, Lathi, Tarapur, Anklav, Sojitra, Dhansura, Malpur, Lakhani, Amirgadh, Suigam, Danta, Dhanera, Vav, Kankrej, Vadgam, Tharad, Deodar, Dantiwada, Netrang, Jesar, Umrala, Vallabhipur, Gariadhar, Palitana, Talaja, Ghogha, Ranpur, Gadhada, Barwala, Botad, Chhota Udepur, Kavant, Nasvadi, Sankheda, Bodeli, Jetpur Pavi, Kalyanpur, Bhanvad, Dhanpur, Sanjeli, Limkheda, Dahod, Fatepura, Jhalod, Singvad, Garbada, Devgadbaria, Gir Gadhada, Talala, Jodiya, Bhesan, Mendarda, Rapar, Nakhatrana, Lakhpat, Mandvi, Galteshwar, Matar, Vaso, Mahudha, Satlasana, Jotana, Kheralu, Becharaji, Vadnagar, Khanpur, Kadana, Virpur, Maliya, Garudeshwar, Dediapada, Tilakwada, Sagbara, Khergam, Ghoghamba, Morwa (Hadaf), Jambughoda, Shehera, Sarasvati, Santalpur, Shankheshwar, Sami, Radhanpur, Harij.
  • Category II - Viramgam, Rajula, Bagasara, Amreli, Umreth, Kambhat, Borsad, Petlad, Meghraj, Bayad, Bhiloda, Modasa, Deesa, Bhabhar, Palanpur, Amod, Jambusar, Valia, Mahuva, Sihor 
  • Category III Daskroi, Bavla, Dholka, Sanand, Mandal, Ahmedabad City, Anand, Jhagadia, Bharuch, Vagra, Anklesvar, Hansot, Bhavnagar, Khambalia, Kalol, Dehgam, Ghandinagar, Lalpur, Jamnagar, Junagadh, Junagadh City, Mundra, Anjar, Gandhidham, Kheda, Nadiad, Kadi, Mehsana, Wankaner, Morbi, Tankara, Navsari, Halol
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Application form
2. Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise 
4. Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
5. Copy of PAN Card of Applicant/Promoters/Directors/partners and authorised signatory 
6. CA certificate for capital investment 
7. Land Document such as NA Permission/ copy of Index/sale deed 
8. Estimates of Power Distribution company (DISCOM) and receipt 
9. Copy of bills issued by Power Distribution company 
10. Copy of Power Distribution License company Certificate (High Tension / Low Tension) 
11. Copy of certificate for social category (if applicable) 
12. Copy of CA Certified Balance Sheet of the latest (if applicable) 
13. Copy of CA certified Shareholding pattern 
14. Copy of sanctioned and connected Load Certificate issued by Power Distribution License Company 
15. Self-certified expenditure statement supported by DISCOM documents 
16. Copy of GPCB approved NOC/Consent & other departments approval (if applicable) 
17. Bank details for payment (Cancelled cheque) 
18. Copy of GST registration (if applicable) 
19. Self-Attested documents/ details to be submitted by the Authorized Person 
20. Power of attorney/Board resolution/ Consent letter 
21. Supporting documents for SC/ST Enterprise
data.checklist_info_d:
Address:
Jadeja Dharmendrasinh,

Gandhinagar-382010
